Usage Example

{% raw %} 
data = 100 + 0.5*np.random.randn(1000)
print('Mean:', data.mean())
print('STD:', data.std())
{% endraw %}

Apply scaler

{% raw %} 
scaler = Scaler(normalizer='std')
data_norm = scaler.scale(x=data, mask=np.ones(data.shape))
{% endraw %}

Check mean and std

{% raw %} 
print('Mean:', data_norm.mean())
print('STD:', data_norm.std())
{% endraw %}
